description:
### 11.104 framestep

Select one frame every N-th frame.

This filter accepts the following option:

**step**

    Select frame after every step frames. Allowed values are positive integers higher than 0. Default value is 1.
name: framestep

options.description: Select frame after every step frames. Allowed values are positive integers higher than 0. Default value is 1.
options.name: step
